resp = client.indices.create(
    index="idx",
    settings={
        "index": {
            "mapping": {
                "source": {
                    "mode": "synthetic"
                }
            }
        }
    },
    mappings={
        "properties": {
            "flattened": {
                "type": "flattened"
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)

    index="idx",
